article_text: Former Wells Fargo CEO Dick Kovacevich said Friday that regulations are “killing” small banks and have contributed to the loss of more a thousand of them since the financial crisis.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Richard Kovacevich, Wells Fargo, Squawk Box, cnbc, regulations, dodd frank, WFC, wachovia
